ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Brokerage_Scheme__r.Type__c ,"NRI" ) , NOT(ISNULL( Base_Brokerage_for_Local_Bookings__c )) , NOT(ISNULL( Additional_Brokerage_for_Local_Bookings__c )) , NOT(ISNULL( Total_Brokerage_for_Local_Bookings__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Additional Brokerage for Local Bookings should be blank.
